title: DDFP 497: Week 6 Red Challenge Flag Picks & NFC East Playoff Contenders
itunes:title: DDFP 497: Week 6 Red Challenge Flag Picks & NFC East Playoff Contenders
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank, Cynthia Frelund and Matt Harmon to discuss which NFC East teams may make the playoffs, how many fantasy points Colin Kaepernick will score in Week 6 and the best sports jersey numbers. The guys also talk about what they're watching on TV this weekend and say farewell to producer Kent Brown with a round of Pittsburgh football player trivia. Then, the fellas and Cynthia make their selections and break down the biggest Week 6 games in this edition of Red Challenge Flag Picks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
